entry.title: How to teach technical concepts with cartoons
entry.quote: This post is about a few patterns I use when illustrating ideas about computers. If you are interested in using drawings to teach people about your very favorite computer topics, hopefully this will help you!

entry.title: Has the Pandemic Transformed the Office Forever?
entry.quote: Companies are figuring out how to balance what appears to be a lasting shift toward remote work with the value of the physical workplace.

entry.title: Cuffless device delivers clinically accurate blood pressure measurements
entry.quote: The portable, cuffless and calibration-free Minshi device measures blood pressure when pressure is gently applied to either side of the device by gently squeezing between thumb and forefinger. Following simple game-style instructions displayed by the dedicated app and pressing on the V-Sensor on the Minshi occludes the arteries in the tip of the index finger â€“ exactly the same as the proven Riva-Rocci method used by a blood pressure cuff.

entry.title: Trump Riots synchronized
entry.quote: I synced up the videos scraped from Parler and published by ProPublica, so you can watch the Trump riots unfold from many perspectives.

entry.title: Send This to Anyone Who Wants to Know WTF Is Up With GameStop Stock
entry.quote: How a horde of Redditors are destroying various hedge funds and becoming rich.
